Name: Hentai Tentacle Survivors
About the game: Hentai Tentacle Survivors is a top down action shooter where you defend against waves of horny enemies attacking you from all sides. You'll need quick reflexes and a steady hand to survive. Tentacles have no mercy, and they won't stop until they've had their way with you. Good luck! You play as a sexy hentai girl, an experienced special forces operative. You've been sent on a mission to a remote research facility to investigate strange activity. Upon arrival, you find that the place has been overrun by horny creatures. Your mission is to find out what happened and put a stop to these creatures before they can escape and spread their tentacles all over the world. Features: - Precise, top-down action - Intuitive controls - Gorgeous pixel art - Retro sound effects and music - Leveling up and upgrades - Different hentai girls to select Every enemy is ready to ravage you. Take them down before they can get their slimy tentacles on you. As an experience fighter your reflexes are sharp, and your pelvic muscles are strong. Let's see if you can survive this slippery onslaught. Gameplay: - Use [WASD] keys to move - Tentacles are slippery and they won't hesitate so slide under your armor. - The goal is to survive for 120 seconds and kill as many enemies as you can.
